name: Dash Blob
description:
Get through treacherous traps to clear the level. Wall jump, hop and dash yourself out of danger! A short and fun little platformer.

My sort of devlog

Used Assets:

Composer: Matthew Phoenix

Tiny Worlds Thaleah Pixel Font

Unity Technologies Game Jam Menu Template

Ansimuz Sunny Land Forest

Grande Pixel Mine Tileset

Stealthix Animated Traps
